content: removing markers as you come to them co 1 st using backward loop pm k17 19 21 p1 top round 1 k17 19 21 pm p1 pm k17 19 21 p1 repeat round 1 10 12 14 times bobble all k sts knitwise and p sts purlwise thumb divide the sts on waste yarn among 3 dpns attach yarn round 1 from between the purl seam and the first dpn pick up 1 st knitwise k5 6 7 p1 k5 6 7 pick up 1 st knitwise pick up 2 sts purlwise these 2 sts are picked from the loops under the caston st that became the purl seam 15 17 19 sts total round 2 pm for beginning of round k6 7 8 p1 k6 7 8 p2tog rnds 3-6 k6 7 8 p1 k6 7 8 p1 round 7 bobble all k sts knitwise and p sts purlwise finishing to finish use a tapestry needle to weave in all ends block as necessary wear everywhere copyright cid 13 c 2007-2009 sophy t o donnell for personal and non-commercial use only 2 sophy t odonnell@gmail com http //knitsnotesetc com
